column3: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (video game)]]

column1: '''Michael Reisz''' (1968) is an American actor and voice actor. He voiced [[Legolas]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)
column2: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' game, and also did [[Milo Burrows]] uncredited.
